subject: docs: align CLAUDE.md with template — add missing sections and rules
body:
Adds sections and rules that were dropped during the initial merge:
- Best Practices: well-maintained libraries preference
- Code Organization: class size thresholds (400/600 lines)
- Decision Documentation: strengthened to "must", added example
- User Experience: full section (with project note for static site)
- Documentation: /docs structure and rules
- Testing: guidelines (with project note for no test runner yet)
- Paths config: DOCS_PATH, WORKING_DOCS_PATH, etc.
- Workflow: plan path, test step, docs step
- Prohibitions: decision context comments

Keeps intentional project adaptations (Tailwind styling, dark-only theme).
